name: Meteor Run (Triatomino)
description:
Handle a spaceship to avoid the meteor storm that gets in the way! As long as you survive, the meteors start to increase in number, speed and attraction to the player. 

Simple and easy controls:

Controls for Windows:
  • Move: WASD or ← ↑ ↓ →
  • Pause: SPACE or ENTER
  • Leave: ESC
  • Options: O
Controls for Android:
  • Move: drag at any point of the screen to desired direction

You can download the game as an exe file for Windows or as an apk file for Android devices.
